title.rendered: Air Liaison Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
An air liaison officer is generally an air force official acting as an intermediary between the air force they represent and another organization, although this role can vary based on country. In World War II, air liaison officers were senior officers of the Royal Air Force posted within a separate foreign or domestic military or civil service, providing communication between that service and the Royal Air Force.

 

Air Liaison Address: Head Office

607 6e avenue de l’Airport, Jean-Lesage International Airport. Quebec (Quebec) G2G 2T4

Air Liaison Phone: +1-888-589-897

Emergency only: 418 955-1087 (24/7)

Reservations center : 1 888-589-8972 (Monday to Friday from 7 am to 6 pm)

Pierre Tremblay Director of operatives affairs : +1 (581) 995-792

Mathieu Gingras President : +1 (418) 872-6396

Email: info@airliaison.ca

Air Liaison Official website: http://airliaison.ca/en/

Air Liaison Baggage Allowance

Air Liaison Baggage Allowance

View Air Liaison Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

 Queries handled Air Liaison Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Liaison Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Liaison : (click on the stars below)
